short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Finds and displays emails from the current page. And making it easy to copy.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Email Capture is a powerful and intuitive Chrome extension designed for fast email extraction and contact capture from any webpage. With a single click, you can effortlessly extract email addresses, copy them to your clipboard, and adjust the font size for easy readability. Whether you're a marketer, recruiter, or researcher, Email Capture makes contact extraction quick and seamless, helping you gather and organize email contacts directly from the page. Save time and streamline your email collection process with this essential tool for anyone in need of efficient contact management.
